statements: DELETE FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE shares > 100 AND engagement < 0.5
DELETE FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND views > 100
DELETE FROM user_metrics WHERE content_id = 5 AND engagement < 50
DELETE FROM platform_metrics WHERE platform_type = 'social' AND total_views < 100;
DELETE FROM views WHERE viewer_id = 100 AND content_id = 5;
DELETE FROM SiteMetrics WHERE TotalViews > 1000 AND SiteID = 5;
DELETE FROM UserMetrics WHERE UserID = 100 AND UserName = 'John Doe';
